title: Fix some issues with macOS SKGLView
body:
**Description of Change**

Construction of the `SKGLView` for macOS is not working as well as it used to.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes some of #977

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

Less issues on devices with limited/missing GL capabilities.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
